# blavaan

blavaan is a free, open source R package for Bayesian latent variable
analysis. It relies on JAGS and Stan to estimate models via MCMC.

The blavaan functions and syntax are similar to lavaan. For example,
consider the Political Democracy example from Bollen (1989):

``` r
library(lavaan) # for the PoliticalDemocracy data
library(blavaan)

model <- '
   # latent variable definitions
     ind60 =~ x1 + x2 + x3
     dem60 =~ y1 + y2 + y3 + y4
     dem65 =~ y5 + y6 + y7 + y8
   # regressions
     dem60 ~ ind60
     dem65 ~ ind60 + dem60
   # residual covariances
     y1 ~~ y5
     y2 ~~ y4 + y6
     y3 ~~ y7
     y4 ~~ y8
     y6 ~~ y8
'
fit <- bsem(model, data = PoliticalDemocracy)
summary(fit)
```

The development version of blavaan (containing updates not yet on CRAN)
can be installed via the command below. Compilation is required; this
may be a problem for users who currently rely on a binary version of
blavaan from CRAN. A potential alternative is to install a binary from
R-universe.

``` r
remotes::install_github("ecmerkle/blavaan", INSTALL_opts = "--no-multiarch")
```

For further information, see:

Merkle, E. C., Fitzsimmons, E., Uanhoro, J., & Goodrich, B. (2021).
[Efficient Bayesian structural equation modeling in
Stan](https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v100.i06). Journal of Statistical
Software, 100(6), 1–22.

Merkle, E. C., & Rosseel, Y. (2018). [blavaan: Bayesian structural
equation models via parameter
expansion](https://doi.org/10.18637/jss.v085.i04). Journal of
Statistical Software, 85(4), 1–30.

blavaan is supported by the Institute of Education Sciences, U.S.
Department of Education, Grant R305D210044, as well as NSF grants
SES-1061334 and 1460719.

# Package index

## All functions

- [`bcfa()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/bcfa.md) : Fit
  Confirmatory Factor Analysis Models
- [`bgrowth()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/bgrowth.md)
  : Fit Growth Curve Models
- [`blavCompare()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavCompare.md)
  : Bayesian model comparisons
- [`blavFitIndices()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavFitIndices.md)
  [`summary(`*`<blavFitIndices>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavFitIndices.md)
  [`summary(`*`<bfi>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavFitIndices.md)
  : SEM Fit Indices for Bayesian SEM
- [`blavInspect()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavInspect.md)
  [`blavTech()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavInspect.md)
  : Inspect or Extract Information from a Fitted blavaan Object
- [`blavPredict()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavPredict.md)
  : Predict the values of latent variables, observed variables, and
  missing variables.
- [`blav_internal`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`blav_model_test`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`coeffun`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`set_phantoms`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`set_inits`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`set_priors`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  [`labelfun`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blav_internal.md)
  : blavaan internal functions
- [`blavaan-class`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan-class.md)
  [`coef,blavaan-method`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan-class.md)
  [`show,blavaan-method`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan-class.md)
  [`predict,blavaan-method`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan-class.md)
  [`summary,blavaan-method`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan-class.md)
  : Class For Representing A (Fitted) Bayesian Latent Variable Model
- [`blavaan()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/blavaan.md)
  : Fit a Bayesian Latent Variable Model
- [`bsem()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/bsem.md) : Fit
  Structural Equation Models
- [`dpriors()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/dpriors.md)
  : Specify Default Prior Distributions
- [`plot(`*`<blavaan>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/plot.blavaan.md)
  : blavaan Diagnostic Plots
- [`ppmc()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  [`summary(`*`<blavPPMC>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  [`summary(`*`<ppmc>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  [`plot(`*`<blavPPMC>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  [`hist(`*`<blavPPMC>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  [`pairs(`*`<blavPPMC>`*`)`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/ppmc.md)
  : Posterior Predictive Model Checks
- [`sampleData()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/sampleData.md)
  : Sample data from the posterior (or prior) distribution.
- [`standardizedPosterior()`](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/reference/standardizedPosterior.md)
  : Standardized Posterior

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Approximate fit
  indices](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/approx_fi.md):
- [Convergence and Efficiency
  Evaluation](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/convergence_efficiency.md):
- [Convergence
  loop](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/convergence_loop.md):
- [Cross-loadings with strong
  priors](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/cross_loadings_strong_priors.md):
- [Model
  Estimation](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/estimate.md):
- [Measurement
  Invariance](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/invariance.md):
- [Modification
  indices](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/mod_indices.md):
- [Model
  Comparison](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/model_comparison.md):
- [Two-level
  SEM](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/multilevel.md):
- [Ordinal Models in
  blavaan](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/ordinal.md):
- [Plot
  Functionality](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/plotting.md):
- [Prior Predictive
  Checks](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/prior_pred_checks.md):
- [Specifying Prior
  Distributions](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/prior.md):
- [Probability of
  Direction](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/probability_direction.md):
- [Resources](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/resources.md):
- [Getting Started with
  blavaan](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/start.md):
- [Model
  Summaries](http://ecmerkle.github.io/blavaan/articles/summaries.md):
